storyInfo: Arene needs a certificate from the workshop, but the only one there is the apprentice Adnachiel. Not wanting to waste the trip, Arene asks his fellow Sankta to inspect his weapon, and the two get into a discussion about their race.

attributes.content: Weapon reliability certification?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: What’s that about?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You need me to take my weapon down to the workshop for inspection, and have the people there sign off on it?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Do we really have to go through all that just because I brought my own weapon...?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Can’t you bend the rules a little bit, Professor? Just sign off for me.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You can’t? We have procedures?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: That’s lame. Okay, okay. I’ll head over there if you insist.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I only just got here. I don’t want to get on Dr. Kal’tsit’s bad side.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I’ll see you later, Professor.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Landship, Workshop No. 3, Morning
Anybody home?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hello there. The workshop isn’t open right now. All five of our craftsmen are involved in a weapon repair contest.
If you need anything, please come back after 3 o’clock.
A weapon repair contest? They really have contests for everything, don’t they?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: How does it work? Do you break the weapons first and then repair them? Or is it about who polishes a shinier blade?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Sorry to disappoint, but it’s just a contest where you repair weapons damaged out in the field.
But if you manage to make a weapon shiny enough to give it a deadly glint, I suppose you’d have a fair chance of winning.
...Hm? That doesn’t sound like a bad idea. I’ll give it a try next time.
Ha, you weirdo. Well, have fun with that.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I don’t want to have to come all the way down here again. The craftsmen may not be around, but you’re here.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: It’s just some routine inspection anyway. No need to take it so seriously. How about it, friend? Give it a quick look-over and sign right here?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Weapon reliability certification?
That’s right.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Your weapon needs to be inspected by two craftsmen before it can be approved.
And I’m technically still an intern assistant. I’m afraid signing my name there isn’t going to do you much help.
So it needs to be signed off by two people. Perfect. We’ve got two people right here, you and me.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I know my staff better than anyone else, and I know for certain there is nothing wrong with it. If nothing happens, no one is going to find out, and if no one finds out, then we don’t have a problem. Am I right?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh, that’s an interesting way to think about it.
I don’t recommend underestimating the people here, though. Definitely not the strict ones.
If something does happen, there’s going to be quite a ruckus. Even though they aren’t here right now, all the craftsmen will face punishment. It’ll be even worse for the two of us.
Tsk, so inflexible.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: It may be inflexible, but it’s effective. There are people who don’t maintain their weapons well.
Trust me. This is much easier than having to fix things on the fly out in the field.
What kind of moron doesn’t take care of his weapons?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Fine. In that case...
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Take a look at my weapon.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You can at least do that for me, right? It’d really piss me off if I had to come all the way here for nothing.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh... sure. Just a moment.
Let me tighten this last screw... okay.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Hm... That look on your face tells me you are still planning something. It doesn’t seem like you’ve quite given up yet.
I’m not sure I understand.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Here you go. This is my staff.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Eh... Oh well.
Okay, I’ll inspect it for you.
(Quietly) Just be careful with it, don’t cause any accidents, and it should be fine, right...?
I’m counting on you.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: The inspection is going to take some time. Could you please wait here while I work on it?
You are free to look around, but try not to touch anything in the workshop. Some of the craftsmen here like to work on dangerous things...
You know what I mean, right? The ones they haven’t finished yet are even more dangerous.
On top of that, we have a lot of ores here with Originium in them... You may be Infected, but you should still be careful.
No need to worry about me. I’m not that adventurous.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: ...Wait a second.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Now that’s weird. Did I ever tell you I’m Infected?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: No, you didn’t. But it isn’t hard to tell.
Explain. Is it obvious?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hmm... How can I put it?
I guess it’s just by observation. There is quite a lot you can learn from someone’s expressions, actions, and the logic in his behavior.
It sounds kinda like you’re pulling my leg.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I’m telling the truth.
Is this staff the only thing you need me to inspect? If there is anything else, I can take a look at those as well.
Nope, that’s it.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I don’t have a gun, unfortunately.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: What a coincidence. Me neither.
You’re kind of weird. Intriguing.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm... thanks?
That’s not a compliment.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: There aren't any problems with the staff. Just a quick glance should be enough.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I have to look it over thoroughly.
Hmm... the materials that went into this staff are top grade.
Is the thing hanging from your staff a Caster Source as well?
Yes. But more importantly, and this is what I like about it, I can beat people up with it.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Good thinking. It must come in handy in close quarters combat.
What’s your name, craftsman?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Well, I'm not exactly a craftsman.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I’m Adnachiel, Reserve Op Team A4. I’m also an intern in this repair workshop.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Arene.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Your name really fits you.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Hm... the main Arts Unit doesn’t look like it has any damage to it, and the Caster Source hanging there doesn’t have any apparent damage or cracks, either.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It looks like it's in pretty good shape.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Hehe, what did I tell you?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Okay, moving on, could you activate your Originium Arts with your staff? I need to check its feedback during use and verify its performance.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Just use my Arts here? My Arts are kind of wild.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh, could you describe what it’s like?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Disintegrative and toxic.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Wow, that does sound fairly dangerous.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: In that case, why don’t you put your staff in that transparent cabinet there? Then just put your hand in from the opening on the side and use your Arts.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That way, even if your Arts are as volatile as you said, we shouldn’t have anything to worry about.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Sounds like a pan.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Do I have to...?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Okay, fine.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Will this do it?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Okay, that’s good. I’ll activate the machine.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Don’t worry if you feel pressure in your arm. That’s normal.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Okay, we’re ready!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You can use your Originium Arts now. No need to worry about hurting me.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I won’t.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Uses Originium Arts)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Alright, we’re done here!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I’ll take care of the rest. Just leave me your staff and take a break over there.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Most Sankta are care about guns and crossbows. You look like you’re pretty familiar with staves too. Are all Sankta outside Laterano like this?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: It’s just the master craftsman I work with, Iron Hammer, is an expert in maintaining and forging staves. I also have some friends on my team who need their weapons looked after.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He’s an expert in staves, but his codename is Iron Hammer?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: That’s right.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The craftsmen here are all pretty laid-back with their names. It left me dumbfounded for the better part of the day when I first got here.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Look, their badges are all there.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You can take a look if you’re interested.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Don’t mind if I do.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Repair Workshop No. 3 - List of Personnel)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Iron Hammer, Tincan, Rock, Wreck Shield, and Gunject...)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (That’s more than being just laid-back...)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (This might be a good opportunity, though...)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Do they have to stencil their signatures on their badges?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That’s just something they all did one time out of spite.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: There was this one day they had an argument over craftsmanship, so they all competed against each other making their own badges using their respective trades.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: After they cooled their heads, they all thought it was pretty fun, and agreed to wear the badges they made themselves in the workshop, and only use the standard issue ones outside.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Interesting, isn’t it?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Yeah... That’s... very interesting.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Their signatures are all here. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (It’s all handwritten, too. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Perfect. This will save me a lot of work. I just need to get my hands on two of these...)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: *Glances*
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Ha, perfect timing. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Stamp this here...)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Done. These Originium Arts really come in handy. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: (Hm? This signature is in Lateran. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hey, Adnachiel. Who’s this guy?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oh, that’s Gunject.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He’s from Laterano, just like us.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He doesn’t like to make anything gun-related, just swords.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: So he doesn’t have a gun?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh, he has one, but he doesn’t like guns, as a thing.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I heard he left his at home in Laterano, and he hasn’t been back since.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: 'There’s nothing but bullet casings in that place. Just the sight of it gives me a headache. '
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That’s what he said.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I agree with him.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I have a feeling I’ll get along with him pretty well.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Well, unfortunately, he got into a fight with his family over that. He can’t even go home anymore.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: If he really hates guns so much, I can’t imagine him having many fond memories of Laterano.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Does he still want to go back in spite of it all?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Is Laterano such a great place that it takes everyone down memory lane?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I never thought about it.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: What about you? Do you miss Laterano?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm... Hard to say.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I haven’t lived there for a long time.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Because of my halo, you see.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: After that, I contracted Oripathy, which means I really don’t have a way to go back.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Wait, so your halo doesn’t float like that because of Oripathy?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Nope, I was born differently.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: That’s... kind of sad.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: When I was a kid, my parents always praised me and said that with a smile, so I’ve always thought of myself as pretty lucky.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I was born different than others. Doesn’t that sound cool?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oh, of course, it’s just a joke.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Don’t be modest. You are very different from the other weirdos here. In a bad way.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Really? And here I thought I was pretty normal...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I’m not that different from other Sankta. In fact, I have a lot in common with them.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Such as? What do you have in common with them?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Such as... let’s see, like how I can’t wear a hat?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Hahahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Ahem, yeah, you’re right. That’s true.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Wearing a hat is like getting stuffed into an egg with no cracks. It’s gross.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Other than the Notarial Hall people or the Apostolic Knights, with all their training, I don’t think there are many Sankta who could stand to wear a hat. Maybe some weirdos who love to fight.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: In any case, maybe it’s because of my halo, but I couldn’t get my firearm qualifications, and my family moved out of Laterano shortly after that.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: And I was Infected not long after.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Laterano doesn’t permit Infected in its borders. I’m sure you haven’t been back since your infection, am I correct?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: That’s why... I don’t feel particularly nostalgic about Laterano.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I don’t remember a lot about my childhood there, either.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Oh, but I still remember the baker down the street, John!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: He taught me how to make desserts, and he even put all his recipes in a book for me when I moved away!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: (Tsk... Here we go. The Sankta and their sweet tooth. )
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I really wish I didn’t lose that book in the move... *Sigh*
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: (My parents got me a huge cake every year. They knew I couldn’t finish it all, but they still left me home alone to deal with that block of sugary mess by myself.)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: At the very least, my Warhead muffins are no less decadent than the muffins John used to make.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I can still remember the aroma of his dessert shop.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: (I remember that smell too. Every time I smell it, my throat starts to ache.)
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh, I see you don’t like desserts.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I think you’re the first Laterano I’ve met who doesn’t.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: ...You can tell?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I don’t normally tell people I can see through them, since they don’t like it much. Most times I just keep my mouth shut.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It doesn’t seem like you mind, though.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Yeah, it’s fine.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I don’t mind. Weirdos like you are more interesting than normal people.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I think you’re much more of a weirdo for not liking desserts.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I’ll try to make some that aren’t as sweet. You’ll have to give them a try.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I wonder if the old baker is doing well...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Maybe I should ask the Messengers at Logistics to help me out.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I’ve come to understand one thing.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You’re a Laterano Sankta through and through.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Even though you don’t have a gun, and your halo’s tilted.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You’re right.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I still have memories of that place, and it’s just the city that I can’t go back to, not my home. Your hometown is something you can always reach out for, no matter when or where.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: There’s travel, mail, messages, and photos that can move between the cities.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: If we really want to reminisce about our home countries, there are a lot of convenient ways for us to do that.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: You know, I get what you’re saying.
But there’s also people who like to revisit a place, to smell and touch it in person. Otherwise, they get homesick.
Well, not that I care.
Just remember to gimme some of those desserts.
Hello, Ambriel.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Hiyas.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oh, heyas, new meat.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: So what’s your name, cutie?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Arene.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hi there, Arene.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Adnachiel, you know the drill. Take care of my gun, okay?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You can just leave it over there. I’m still working on Arene’s weapon.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Sure—
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hm? What’s that smell? It smells so good! It’s unlike anything on the market...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Is one of you guys wearing perfume?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: If you like how I smell, come get all the sniffs you want.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hmm... think I’m gonna pass.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Something tells me that’s not a good idea.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But if that smell can knock me out for the whole day, I’ll think about it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You know that guy with the poker face? He’s trying to get me to 'fulfill my obligations' again.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Instead of running away all the time, I’m thinking it makes hella more sense if I just pass out for the day.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Actually, those guys are so braindead, just a day probably isn’t gonna be enough.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Argh, what a pain in the butt.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The guy with the poker face... You mean the one from the Notarial Hall?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Who else?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: They haven’t come for you yet? Like, to oversee your fulfillment of your obligations as a citizen and all that?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: They have.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: But the last guy who kicked my door down while I was taking a nap is still running around, taking care of some business for me.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: They may be trouble, but they also know how to take care of troubles.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: If you figure out how to use them, they aren’t so bad.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Whoa, you sound like such a baddie. Nice.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Should I say thanks?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: No thanks.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Arene, I’m finished inspecting your staff!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The casting circuits have corroded a little, but everything else is fine.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: The tiny bit of corrosion isn’t going to affect your Arts, but if you want me to do some maintenance work on it, I can take care of that right now.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: When the craftsmen are here in the afternoon, you can come back and have them sign the certification.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: (Quietly) Even if it looks like you don’t need them to.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Now let’s take a look at Ambriel’s rifle... Hmm.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It’s all yours.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You don’t work on the gun yourself?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But that’s such a pain sometimes. This is easier.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Just wait for it to break.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Well... I can’t have that.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: If I lose my gun, I lose my pay.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: And if I lose my pay, I lose any chance to slack off.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I’m not that stupid.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hmm... You’re more serious than I thought.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: If I didn’t need my gun to get by, I wouldn’t mind letting it gather dust in my closet.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oh, I guess I could probably do that in Laterano, but if I actually left it to gather dust, I’d have some relative on my case the very next day.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: That’s why I gave up on that idea.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Ambriel, your rifle’s fine.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It didn’t have any problems to begin with. I calibrated it just last week.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You just gotta put some oil on it and we should be good.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Do you think keeping a gun around is a hassle at times like these?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: It’s not bad.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I get by somehow.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Just like when you ran all the way here from Laterano?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You don’t hold back, do you? You’ll never be popular with girls if you’re that blunt up front, you know?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: My apologies, then. Were you offended?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Not really.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You’re right. It’s more or less like that. I’m not very a good fit for that place.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Rather than having to defend the city and get yelled at about glory and honor all day, I’d rather make myself some money.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: There’s less to worry about, and life’s a lot more comfortable.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: What’s not to like?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It sounds like you don’t have many fond memories of Laterano.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: If life’s not bad, anywhere’s fine.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It’s not like there’s a rule that Sankta have to live out their lives in Laterano anyway.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The world’s a big place. Gotta see more of it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Your rifle’s ready, Ambriel!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Yep, I couldn’t make it prettier if I tried!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You two keep talking. I’ll head back and chill. Laters.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: See ya!
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It’s almost time for lunch. Is there anything else you need me to look at?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: If not, I’ll lock up and head out to eat.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Do you want to get lunch together?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: No, I already have plans with Executor. You know, from the Notarial Hall. It seems like he has something important to tell me.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Do you think he’d owe me one if I told him Ambriel stopped by here?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Uh? That’s a joke, isn’t it?
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: It is.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You really joke around quite a lot.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: I can tell you’re kidding, but others might not be able to tell, so I suggest you be a little more careful with that.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: No need to worry about me.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh yeah, are you going to be around this afternoon?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm? Yeah.  I will be back here after lunch.
attributes.name: Adnachiel

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You know, your observation is on another level, but there’s one thing you got wrong.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I’ll be back this afternoon.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: It sounds like this Gunject is a pretty interesting person. I wouldn’t mind stopping by again just to meet him.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I’ll see you again in the afternoon.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I’m back, Professor.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Of course. I went to the workshop.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Oh... I can’t give you this, though.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: You can tell? There’s no one at the workshop, unfortunately. I copied their signatures. They didn’t sign off on it.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: *Sigh*... i thought I would turn this in and get it over with, but you saw right through it. Adnachiel was right. The Doctor is sharp.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Don’t worry. I’ll go there again in the afternoon. Give me another certification form. I’ll get their real signatures after they finish with their competition.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hm? I got more honest all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Haha, don’t say that, Professor. Haven’t I always followed your instructions?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Eh, come on, don’t give me that look.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Why did I change my mind?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: I met a lot of interesting people, and it’s not a bad idea to spend a little more time because of that.
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: How’s that?
attributes.name: Arene

attributes.content: Is that a good reason?
attributes.name: Arene
